"Telepipes":
"When viewing some Ep.1, Ep.2 and Ep.3 events, scenes of Alma's reflections on events have been added.

If you have already cleared any of these events, their clear marker will be shown half-filled."

"Telepipes

Telepipes also exist in item form. You can place a telepipe at any time by using it.

This is useful for allowing players joining your party to quickly catch up to you.

※You cannot take another party's Telepipe.
※Telepipes can be used by all members of your party, and each party may have only one active telepipe at any given time."
